doc.name: AFDXESsAttributes
doc.description: The attributes configured per port which is mediated by a AFDXESs. XXX
doc.author: Gilles Lasnier, Based on BasiSwitch.java by Patricia Derler
doc.property: The name of the virtual link object. This defaults to an empty string.
The value of the bag. This defaults to the double value 0.0
The frame size. This defaults to the integer 0.
The name of the scheduler multiplexor. This defaults to an empty string.
